message: Processing complete! Your training module is ready.

steps.title: Initial Unlock Attempt
steps.description: Attempt to unlock the device by entering the four-digit code.

steps.title: Troubleshooting a Locked Screen
steps.description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and device remains locked), repeatedly press the screen or buttons until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This indicates the device has reset.

steps.title: Unlocking After Reset
steps.description: Once the screen is blank with a red blinking light, enter the four-digit code again to unlock the device. The order of entering the digits does not matter.
